paras.para2: Use it for engaging conversations, gain insights, automate tasks, and witness the future of AI, all in one place.
一个开源的、支持中英双语的对话语言模型，基于 General Language Model (GLM) 架构，具有 62 亿参数

paras.para1: The next generation of our open source large language model
paras.para2: This release includes model weights and starting code for pretrained and fine-tuned Llama language models (Llama Chat, Code Llama) — ranging from 7B to 70B parameters.
